Text

And when the truth about [[Paige]38-paige 's father]113-paige 's father is finally exposed , [Ryan]39-ryan will do anything to fix everything . [Paige]38-paige has always been [his]39-ryan — and [[his]39-ryan alone]114-his alone .

Chapter One

Paige

[I]0-i DIDN’T KNOW [you]171-you could actually feel [someone]126-someone ’s eyes on [you]171-you . [I]0-i do n’t mean that creeping feeling when [you]171-you think [someone]126-someone is staring at [you]171-you and all the hairs on the back of [your]171-you neck stand up . No , this is different . [I]0-i can feel [his]126-someone eyes on every part of [my]0-i skin . They make [my]0-i body warm , in places [I]0-i did n’t even know existed . A part of [me]0-i [I]0-i ’d buried long ago . [Other girls]174-other girls probably feel this all the time , but not [me]0-i . It ’s like [he]126-someone has intimate knowledge of [my]0-i body , and somehow it belongs to [him]126-someone . [His]126-someone eyes , roaming [my]0-i body , fascinate [me]0-i . [I]0-i remember every detail about them , and it ’s both a blessing and a curse . When [I]0-i look at [him]126-someone , [I]0-i never know what eyes [I]0-i ’ll receive . Sometimes they ’re bright green like a fresh shamrock . Other times , when the light hits just right , little blue specks shine through , making them appear almost cerulean . But [my]0-i favorite is when they turn a dark green . They ’re the color of a morning forest , soft and crisp , and [I]0-i know [he]126-someone ’s playing it cool . [I]0-i often wonder if [I]0-i ’m [the only one who can see the difference]175-the only one who can see the difference . [He]126-someone ’s always so calm and cool , but [his]126-someone eyes probably show [me]0-i more than [he]126-someone wants . Or maybe [I]0-i ’m the one doing a little too much staring . It makes [me]0-i wonder if there ’s more to [this man who always seems so perfect]176-this man who always seems so perfect . [He]126-someone ’s too good and clean . If [he]126-someone knew everything about [me]0-i , [I]0-i probably would n’t get those eyes on [me]0-i like [I]0-i do now . The ones [I]0-i secretly love . At first [I]0-i thought [Ryan Justice]39-ryan did n’t like [me]0-i , but over the years [I]0-i ’ve noticed it is n’t dislike , no matter how hard [I]0-i try to annoy [him]126-someone . The annoyance [I]0-i once read in [his]126-someone eyes has turned out to be hunger . The more [I]0-i poke at [him]126-someone and push [him]126-someone away , the more that hunger grows . Or maybe that ’s [my]0-i own [I]0-i ’m feeling . [I]0-i should stay as far away from [him]126-someone as possible , because [he]126-someone could break [me]0-i . [I]0-i ’ve already had [one man]177-one man almost shatter [me]0-i , and [I]0-i do n’t think [I]0-i could survive another , no matter how bad [I]0-i want it . [I]0-i turn [my]0-i head and look across [the crowded ballroom]178-the crowded ballroom to find [him]126-someone leaning up against the wall with [his]126-someone eyes on [me]0-i . Just like [I]0-i knew [they]179-they would be . Like they always are . [He]126-someone looks casual in [his]126-someone suit as [he]126-someone tries to appear nonthreatening , which is impossible when [you]180-you ’re built like [him]126-someone . [His]126-someone size is intimidating , and even more so when [he]126-someone ’s got well over a foot and a half on [you]180-you , like [he]126-someone does [me]0-i . [I]0-i know [he]126-someone hates the suits , because when [we]181-we ’re at [work]182-work [he]126-someone always ditches the jacket and rolls up [his]126-someone sleeves , revealing the tattoos that coat [his]126-someone thick arms . It ’s the one thing that always seemed off about [him]126-someone . The tattoos never matched the good ol’ boy attitude . It ’s as if [everyone in [the room]119-the room]183-everyone in the room knows not to block [his]126-someone line of sight on [me]0-i , because even in [this crowded room]185-this crowded room [no one]150-no one has stepped in [his]126-someone way . If [I]0-i want out of [his]126-someone view , [I]0-i ’ll have to leave and find somewhere else to stand . That ’s where the real inner battle begins . To move or not to move . As much as [I]0-i hate the staring , [I]0-i want it . [I]0-i ’ve been pushing for it , no matter how much [I]0-i try to lie to [myself]0-i that [I]0-i have n’t . [I]0-i ’ve come to crave it . This dress is exhibit A of that fact . [I]0-i picked it out with [him]126-someone in mind . [I]0-i asked [myself]0-i what would [Ryan]39-ryan — or [Captain America]67-captain , as [Mallory]45-mallory and [I]0-i call [him]126-someone — think of this dress . Would it piss [him]126-someone off like it does when [I]0-i wear a sports bra and skintight shorts to [our]187-our training exercises ? At first [I]0-i did n’t do it on purpose , but when [I]0-i saw it bothered [him]126-someone , [I]0-i did it more . It ’s a head game [I]0-i ’m playing . No matter how much [I]0-i tell [myself]0-i [Captain]188-captain is n’t for [me]0-i , [I]0-i ca n’t stop trying to get [his]126-someone attention . [I]0-i guess it ’s more like provoking [him]126-someone , because [his]126-someone attention is always on [me]0-i . [I]0-i like it when [I]0-i get the rise , even though [I]0-i push [him]126-someone away when [he]126-someone gets too close . [God]46-god , what is wrong with [me]0-i ? [I]0-i ’ve become one of [those girls who play games]189-those girls who play games . That is n’t [me]0-i , but [I]0-i find [I]0-i ’m not always [me]0-i when it comes to [him]126-someone . [I]0-i ’m different . Or maybe it ’s not different , exactly . [He]126-someone draws out a part of [me]0-i that [I]0-i do n’t want coming out . [I]0-i pull [my]0-i eyes away from [him]126-someone and turn , giving [him]126-someone a side view . The black strapless dress reaches all the way to the floor , fitting snugly against [me]0-i . It looks conservative … until [I]0-i move . There ’s a slit that runs up one side , all the way from the floor to the top of [my]0-i hip . It bares [my]0-i leg , [my]0-i thigh , [my]0-i hip , making it impossible to wear underwear . Top that off with the killer heels [I]0-i have on and for once [I]0-i feel tall . [My]0-i legs seem longer with the tall heels and cut of the dress . [I]0-i feel sexy , which is something [I]0-i ’m not used to . However , over the past few weeks [I]0-i ’ve found [myself]0-i wanting to be more than just plain [Paige]45-mallory . [I]0-i move through [the room]119-the room , cataloging everything , even though [we]191-we are n’t officially on the clock tonight . [We]191-we ’re here only as light security , but the need to know [my]0-i surroundings is always there . Tonight , as always , [Captain]67-captain and [I]0-i are to protect [[my]0-i boss and half brother]192-my boss and half brother , [Miles Osborne]41-miles , and [[his]41-miles girlfriend]193-his girlfriend , [Mallory]45-mallory . [Mallory]45-mallory is [[my]0-i best friend]194-my best friend , so [I]0-i ’ve always got [her]45-mallory back , and tonight is no different . [We]191-we ’re meant to blend in , but if something catches [our]191-we eye [we]191-we ’re to point it out to [the security on call]195-the security on call . The charity event is auctioning off millions of dollars in different pieces , so there ’s [plenty of staff]196-plenty of staff to handle this . [Miles]41-miles just likes to take extra precautions . There are art pieces , jewelry , and [God]46-god knows what else here that cost more than [one person]197-one person makes in a lifetime . Chapter Eight

Chapter Eighteen

Introducing the [Carina Press Romance Promise]30-carina press romance promise ! [The Carina Press team]1734-the carina press team all have one thing in common : [we]1717-you guys are [romance readers]1735-romance readers with a longtime love of the genre . And [we]1717-you guys know what [readers]1736-readers are looking for in a romance : a guarantee of a happily - ever - after ( HEA ) or happy - for - now ( HFN ) . With that in mind , [we]1717-you guys ’re initiating the Carina Press Romance Promise . When [you]1715-you see a book tagged with these words in [our]1717-you guys cover copy / book description , [we]1717-you guys ’re making [you]1715-you , [the reader]1737-the reader , a very important promise : This book contains a romance central to the plot and ends in an HEA or HFN . Simple , right ? But so important , [we]1717-you guys know ! Look for the Carina Press Romance Promise and one - click with confidence that [we]1717-you guys understand what ’s at the heart of the romance genre ! Look for this line in [Carina Press]28-carina press book descriptions : One - click with confidence . This title is part of the Carina Press Romance Promise : all the romance [you]1715-you ’re looking for with an HEA / HFN . It ’s a promise ! Find out more at CarinaPress.com/RomancePromise .
